getFaithRewardInfo(uint256).details: 查询某轮次信仰奖励获奖人列表和奖金列表

getFissionRewardInfo(uint256).details: 查询某轮次裂变奖励列表

getLuckyRewardInfo(uint256).details: 查询某轮次幸运奖励获奖人列表和奖金列表

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.

settlementReward().details: 每一轮次结束之后调用此方法分配奖励

toBeFissionPerson(address).details: 在调用这个方法之前，需要用户前往Token合约调用Approve方法，获得授权

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

withdrawAllETH().details: 提取用户账户中所有的ETH

getFissionRewardInfo(uint256).notice: 查询当前轮次的裂变奖励获奖详情

getLuckyRewardInfo(uint256).notice: 获取该轮次幸运奖励详情

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

toBeFissionPerson(address).notice: 成为裂变者，这是参与共建的第一步

withdrawAllETH().notice: funder提取自己获奖所得的所有ETH

getCurrentStepFundsInfo().notice: 查询当前轮次组建期开放多少token，募资期已经募得的ETH
